text: José Antonio Bautista (born October 19, 1980 in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic) is a Dominican Major League Baseball player. He has played for the Baltimore Orioles in 2004, the Tampa Bay Devil Rays in 2004, Kansas City Royals in 2004, the Pittsburgh Pirates from 2004 to 2008 and the Toronto Blue Jays since 2008. Bautista plays as both an outfielder and third baseman. Most often, he plays right field. He is also one of 26 players in the 50 home run club. In both the 2010 and 2011 seasons, he hit more home runs than any other player. He hit 54 home runs in 2010 and 43 home runs in 2011. == Other websites == * Jose Bautista's MLB player profile Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Pittsburgh Pirates players Category:Tampa Bay Devil Rays players Category:Toronto Blue Jays players Category:Dominican Republic baseball players
title: José Bautista
